excerpt: The Stratus+ lets you clip your phone on the controller for a full handheld experience.
text: If you’re looking for a wireless controller that’s compatible with your Android phone or Chromebook (even with Windows), then you might want to check out the SteelSeries Stratus+, which packs a ton of features made for gamers who spend a lot of time on their Chromebook or Android smartphone. It’s on sale at Amazon right now, with up to 60% off its usual price. The controller comes with with Bluetooth LE connectivity, allowing it to pair with Android and Chromebook devices, and can also be used for Windows computers via a wired connection. The controller also comes with 90-hour battery life, making it ideal for prolonged gaming sessions. In case you run out of battery, built-in fast charging allows you to get up to 12 hours of playtime with a quick 15-minute charge. The Stratus+ also comes with a phone mount so you can clip your phone on the controller for the full-handheld experience.
